bold.description: Use for headers.

plain.description: Use for body copy and menu items.

inverted.description: Use for text on bold backgrounds.

disabled.description: Use for text in a disabled state.

selected.description: Use for text in selected states (e.g., tabs or menu items).

primary.description: Use for primary actions on 'color.background.primary.muted' and 'color.background.primary.subtle'.

secondary.description: Use for secondary actions on 'color.background.secondary.muted' and 'color.background.secondary.subtle'.

plain.description: Use for text that communicates informative messages the user needs to be aware of on neutral backgrounds.

bold.description: Use for text that communicates informative messages the user needs to be aware of on info backgrounds, such as 'color.background.info.muted' and 'color.background.info.subtle'.

plain.description: Use for text that communicates a favorable outcome on neutral backgrounds.'

bold.description: Use for text that communicates a favorable outcome on positive backgrounds, such as 'color.background.positive.muted', and 'color.background.positive.subtle'.

plain.description: Use for text that communicates caution to prevent mistakes or errors on neutral backgrounds.

bold.description: Use for text that communicates caution to prevent mistakes or errors on caution backgrounds, such as 'color.background.caution.muted', and 'color.background.caution.subtle'.

inverted.description: Use for text that communicates caution to prevent mistakes or errors on 'color.background.caution.bold'.

plain.description: Use for text that communicates negative or serious error states (e.g., validation errors or irreversible actions) on neutral backgrounds.

bold.description: Use for text that communicates negative or serious error states (e.g., validation errors or irreversible actions) on 'color.background.negative.muted', and 'color.background.negative.subtle'.

plain.description: Use for blue text on neutral backgrounds for purely stylistic purposes with no specific meaning.

bold.description: Use for blue text on 'color.background.accent.blue.muted' or 'color.background.accent.blue.subtle', when used purely for stylistic purposes without specific meaning.

plain.description: Use for green text on neutral backgrounds for purely stylistic purposes with no specific meaning.

bold.description: Use for green text on 'color.background.accent.green.muted' or 'color.background.accent.green.subtle', when used purely for stylistic purposes without specific meaning.

faint.description: Use for faint text on neutral backgrounds, providing low contrast. Not intended for primary content, as it does not meet WCAG 2.2 AA contrast requirements. Use sparingly where accessibility isn't a critical concern.

muted.description: Use for muted grey text for purely stylistic purposes with no specific meaning.

subtle.description: Use for subtle grey text for purely stylistic purposes with no specific meaning.

plain.description: Use for plain grey text for purely stylistic purposes with no specific meaning.

bold.description: Use for bold grey text for purely stylistic purposes with no specific meaning.

plain.description: Use for yellow text on neutral backgrounds for purely stylistic purposes with no specific meaning.

bold.description: Use for yellow text on 'color.background.accent.yellow.muted' or 'color.background.accent.yellow.subtle', when used purely for stylistic purposes without specific meaning.

plain.description: Use for red text on neutral backgrounds for purely stylistic purposes with no specific meaning.

bold.description: Use for red text on 'color.background.accent.red.muted' or 'color.background.accent.red.subtle', when used purely for stylistic purposes without specific meaning.

plain.description: Use for links in their default or hovered state. Underline links when hovered.

active.description: Use for links in the active state.

visited.description: Use for links in a visited state.

bold.description: Use for icons paired with 'color.text.bold'.

plain.description: Use for icons paired with 'color.text.plain'.

inverted.description: Use for icons on bold backgrounds.

disabled.description: Use for icons in a disabled state.

selected.description: Use for icons in selected state (e.g., tabs or menu items).

primary.description: Use for icons in primary actions paired with a 'color.background.primary.muted' background.

secondary.description: Use for icons in secondary actions paired with a 'color.background.secondary.muted' background.

plain.description: Icons that serve as visual cues for informative messages the user needs to be aware of, applied on neutral backgrounds.

bold.description: Icons that serve as visual cues for informative messages the user needs to be aware of, applied on 'color.background.info.muted' or 'color.background.info.subtle'.

plain.description: Icons that serve as visual cues for messages communicating a favorable outcome, applied on neutral backgrounds.

bolder.description: Icons that serve as visual cues for messages communicating a favorable outcome on'color.background.positive.muted' or 'color.background.positive.subtle'.

plain.description: Use for icons that serve as visual cues for messages communicating caution to prevent mistakes or errors, applied on neutral backgrounds.

bold.description: Use for icons that serve as visual cues for messages communicating caution to prevent mistakes or errors, applied on 'color.background.caution.muted' or 'color.background.caution.subtle'.

inverted.description: Use for icons that serve as visual cues for messages communicating caution to prevent mistakes or errors, applied on 'color.background.caution.bold'.

plain.description: Use for icons that serve as visual cues for messages communicating negative or serious error states (e.g., validation errors or irreversible actions), applied on neutral backgrounds.

bold.description: Use for icons that serve as visual cues for messages communicating negative or serious error states (e.g., validation errors or irreversible actions), applied on 'color.background.negative.muted' and 'color.background.negative.subtle'.

plain.description: Use for blue icons on neutral backgrounds for purely stylistic purposes with no specific meaning.

bold.description: Use for blue icons on 'color.background.accent.blue.muted' or 'color.background.accent.blue.subtle', when used purely for stylistic purposes without specific meaning.

plain.description: Use for green icons on neutral backgrounds for purely stylistic purposes with no specific meaning.

bold.description: Use for green icons on 'color.background.accent.green.muted' or 'color.background.accent.green.subtle', when used purely for stylistic purposes without specific meaning.
Use for bold grey icons for purely stylistic purposes with no specific meaning.

plain.description: Use for plain grey icons for purely stylistic purposes with no specific meaning.

subtle.description: Use for subtle grey icons for purely stylistic purposes with no specific meaning.

muted.description: Use for muted grey icons for purely stylistic purposes with no specific meaning.

faint.description: Use for faint grey icons for purely stylistic purposes with no specific meaning.

plain.description: Use for yellow icons on neutral backgrounds for purely stylistic purposes with no specific meaning.

bold.description: Use for yellow icons on 'color.background.accent.yellow.muted' or 'color.background.accent.yellow.subtle', when used purely for stylistic purposes without specific meaning.

plain.description: Use for red icons on neutral backgrounds for purely stylistic purposes with no specific meaning.

bold.description: Use for red icons on 'color.background.accent.red.muted' or 'color.background.accent.red.subtle', when used purely for stylistic purposes without specific meaning.

plain.description: Use to visually group or seperate UI elements, such as card, tabs or side panel dividers.

bold.description: A neutral border option that passes min 3:1 contrast ratios.

inverted.description: Use for borders on bold backgrounds.

disabled.description: Use for borders of elements in a disabled state.

focused.description: Use for focus rings of elements in a focus state.

selected.description: Use for borders that emphasize selected states, such as tabs or menu items.

input.description: Use for borders of form UI elements, such as text fields, checkboxes and, radio buttons.

primary.description: Use for borders that highlight primary actions.

secondary.description: Use for borders that highlight secondary actions.

info.description: Use for borders that highlight informative messages the user needs to be aware of.

positive.description: Use for borders that highlight a favorable outcome.

caution.description: Use for borders that highlight caution to help prevent mistakes or errors.

negative.description: Use for borders that highlight negative or serious error states, such as validation errors or irreversible actions.

blue.description: Use for blue borders for purely stylistic purposes with no specific meaning.

green.description: Use for green borders for purely stylistic purposes with no specific meaning.

faint.description: Use for faint grey borders for purely stylistic purposes with no specific meaning.

plain.description: Use for plain grey borders for purely stylistic purposes with no specific meaning.

bold.description: Use for bold grey borders for purely stylistic purposes with no specific meaning.

heavy.description: Use for heavy grey borders for purely stylistic purposes with no specific meaning.

yellow.description: Use for yellow borders for purely stylistic purposes with no specific meaning.

red.description: Use for red borders for purely stylistic purposes with no specific meaning.

disabled.description: Use for backgrounds of elements in disabled state.

idle.description: Use for backgrounds of form UI elements, such as text fields, checkboxes, and radio buttons.

hover.description: Use for backgrounds of form UI elements, such as text fields, checkboxes, and radio buttons in a hovered state.

active.description: Use for backgrounds of form UI elements, such as text fields, checkboxes, and radio buttons in an active state.

idle.description: Use for backgrounds of elements in selected state with subtle emphasis, such as in opened dropdowns.

hover.description: Use for backgrounds of selected elements in hover state with subtle emphasis, such as in opened dropdowns.

active.description: Use for backgrounds of selected elements in pressed state with subtle emphasis, such as in opened dropdowns.

idle.description: Use for backgrounds of elements in selected state with bold emphasis, such as in opened dropdowns.

hover.description: Use for backgrounds of selected elements in hover state state with bold emphasis, such as in opened dropdowns.

active.description: Use for backgrounds of selected elements in pressed state with bold emphasis, such as in opened dropdowns.

idle.description: Use for the background of primary actions that appear to have no background in idle state. Such as outline and ghost buttons.

hover.description: Use for the background while hovering of primary actions that appear to have no background in idle state. Such as outline and ghost buttons.

active.description: Use for the background while pressing of primary actions that appear to have no background in idle state. such as outline and ghost buttons.

idle.description: A subtle background variant in the primary color.

hover.description: A subtle background variant in the primary color for hover states.

active.description: A subtle background variant in the primary color for active states.

idle.description: Use for the background of primary actions with bold emphasis.

hover.description: Use for the background of primary actions with bold emphasis during hover states.

active.description: Use for the background of primary actions with bold emphasis during pressed states

idle.description: Use for the background of secondary actions that appear to have no background in idle state. Such as outline and ghost buttons.

hover.description: Use for the background while hovering of secondary actions that appear to have no background in idle state. Such as outline and ghost buttons.

active.description: Use for the background while pressing of secondary actions that appear to have no background in idle state. such as outline and ghost buttons.

idle.description: A subtle background variant in the secondary color.

hover.description: A subtle background variant in the secondary color for hover states.

active.description: A subtle background variant in the secondary color for active states.

idle.description: Use for the background of secondary actions with bold emphasis.

hover.description: Use for the background of secondary actions with bold emphasis during hover states.

active.description: Use for the background of secondary actions with bold emphasis during pressed states

idle.description: Background for informative actions, with no background in the idle state, used on outline and ghost buttons.

hover.description: Background for informative actions in hovered state, with no background in the idle state, used on outline and ghost buttons.

active.description: Background for informative actions in pressed state, with no background in the idle state, used on outline and ghost buttons.

idle.description: A subtle background variant for informative messages requiring user attention.

hover.description: A subtle background variant in the hover state for informative messages requiring user attention.

active.description: A subtle background variant in the active state for informative messages requiring user attention.

idle.description: Use for the background of actions with bold emphasis related to informative messages that the user needs to be aware of.

hover.description: Use as the background for actions with bold emphasis during hover states, related to informative messages that the user needs to be aware of.

active.description: Use as the background for actions with bold emphasis during active states, related to informative messages that the user needs to be aware of.

idle.description: Use for the background of actions related to messages that communicate a positive outcome, which appear to have no background in their idle state, such as outline and ghost buttons.

hover.description: Use as background while hovering actions related to messages that communicate a positive outcome, which appear to have no background in their idle state, such as outline and ghost buttons.

active.description: Use as background while pressing actions related to messages that communicate a positive outcome, which appear to have no background in their idle state, such as outline and ghost buttons.

idle.description: A subtle background option for communicating a positive outcome.

hover.description: A subtle background option in the hover state for communicating a positive outcome.

active.description: A subtle background option in the active state for communicating a positive outcome.

idle.description: Use for the background of actions with bold emphasis related to messages that communicate a positive outcome.

hover.description: Use as the background for actions with bold emphasis during hover states, related to messages that communicate a positive outcome.

active.description: Use as the background for actions with bold emphasis during active states, related to messages that communicate a positive outcome.

idle.description: Background for caution to prevent errors, with no background in the idle state, used on outline and ghost buttons.

hover.description: Background for caution to prevent errors in the hovered state, with no background in the idle state, used on outline and ghost buttons.

active.description: Background for caution to prevent errors in the pressed state, with no background in the idle state, used on outline and ghost buttons.

idle.description: A subtle background option for communicating caution to prevent mistakes or errors, such as in inline messages.

hover.description: A subtle background option for communicating caution to prevent mistakes or errors in a hovered state.

active.description: A subtle background option for communicating caution to prevent mistakes or errors in a pressed state.

idle.description: A vibrant background option for communicating caution to prevent mistakes or errors, such as in warning buttons.

hover.description: A vibrant background option for communicating caution to prevent mistakes or errors, such as in warning buttons in a hovered state.

active.description: A vibrant background option for communicating caution to prevent mistakes or errors, such as in warning buttons in a pressed state.

idle.description: Background for negative or serious error states (e.g., validation errors or irreversible actions), with no background in the idle state, used on outline and ghost buttons.

hover.description: Background for negative or serious error states (e.g., validation errors or irreversible actions) in hovered state, with no background in the idle state, used on outline and ghost buttons.

active.description: Background for negative or serious error states (e.g., validation errors or irreversible actions) in pressed, with no background in the idle state, used on outline and ghost buttons.

hover.description: A subtle background option for communicating negative or serious error states (e.g., validation errors or irreversible actions) in hovered state.

active.description: A subtle background option for communicating negative or serious error states (e.g., validation errors or irreversible actions) in pressed state.

idle.description: A vibrant background option for communicating negative or serious error states (e.g., validation errors or irreversible actions), such as in danger buttons.

hover.description: A vibrant background option for communicating negative or serious error states (e.g., validation errors or irreversible actions), such as in danger buttons in a hovered state.

active.description: A vibrant background option for communicating negative or serious error states (e.g., validation errors or irreversible actions), such as in danger buttons in an active state.

plain.description: Use for screen overlay that appears with dialogs or drawers.

hover.description: Use as a background overlay for elements in a hover state when their background color remains unchanged, such as avatars.

active.description: Use as a background overlay for elements in an active state when their background color remains unchanged, such as avatars.

plain.description: Use for skeleton loading states.

subtle.description: Use for the pulse or shimmer effect in skeleton loading states.

idle.description: The default, flat surface level. Used for primary content backgrounds or non-interactive UI regions.

hover.description: The default, flat surface level in hover state. Used for primary content backgrounds.

active.description: Use as the default background for the UI while pressing.

idle.description: Background of elevated components like cards, grids, or dropdowns that sit on top of the base surface. Use in combination with 'elevation.shadow.raised'.

hover.description: Background of elevated components in hovered state like cards, grids, or dropdowns that sit on top of the base surface. Use in combination with 'elevation.shadow.raised'.

active.description: Background of elevated components in active state like cards, grids, or dropdowns that sit on top of the base surface. Use in combination with 'elevation.shadow.raised'.

idle.description: An alternate surface color used for visual differentiation in components like tables or lists, providing contrast between consecutive items (e.g., zebra striping).

hover.description: An alternate surface color in hover state used for visual differentiation in components like tables or lists, providing contrast between consecutive items (e.g., zebra striping).

active.description: An alternate surface color in active state used for visual differentiation in components like tables or lists, providing contrast between consecutive items (e.g., zebra striping).

idle.description: Background for components that create a sunken effect, typically used for grouping related items.

hover.description: Background for components in hover state that create a sunken effect, typically used for grouping related items.

active.description: Background for components in active state that create a sunken effect, typically used for grouping related items.

overflow.description: Use to create a shadow when the content scrolls under other content.

overlay.description: Use for the box shadow of elements that sit on top of the UI, such as dialogs, cards, menus and drawers.
